rooms.name: Adventure game
rooms.info: You wake up in a strange room with a very, I mean VERY, strong urge to immediately escape.

rooms.name: Janitor's closet
rooms.info: You get a hold of your surroundings, you seem to be in the janitor's closet, you rattle the door handle only to find it is locked!

items.investigate: There is a key in one of the pockets

items.look: There is something in the bin.
items.investigate: Aah metal, the fabric of tools, great for MacGyvering!

items.look: There is a beverage box on one of the shelves.
items.interaction: Congratulations, proud owner of empty beverage box.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.info: You find yourself standing at a crossroads, what to do!?

items.look: This door has a sign on it
items.interact: GAME OVER - Don't you read signs?!

items.investigate: The number 4526 is written on the back
items.interact: Seems I pick things up habitually now

rooms.name: Warehouse
rooms.info: Some sort of warehouse, there seem to be an exit at the far end, but don't let that stop you

items.interact: I can't hear you over the sound of my FREEEEEEDOM!

items.investigate: It seems plugged in and ready to go
items.interact: You turn the radio on, it is playing Fortunate son

rooms.clue: Party like it's the 4th of July, get in the mood for freedom

rooms.name: Freedom
rooms.info: You made it! Your fork-lift certification and lifelong thirst for freedom payed off!
rooms.clue: What's that? I can't hear you over the sound of my freedom..
